name: ProFlight
about: ProFlight is the European market leader for flights in Full Flight Simulators, offering over 45 simulators in five locations: Berlin, Essen, Frankfurt, Munich, and Vienna. Founded by former Lufthansa Captain Walter Drasl, ProFlight combines professional flight training with enthusiast experiences using Lufthansa Aviation Trainingâ€™s simulators. Our instructors are experienced, active airline pilots with thousands of hours of flight experience. We provide highly realistic simulations certified to JAR-FCL1A specifications, ensuring an authentic flying experience. ProFlight also offers unique business training and aviation events through its partnerships. With a strong focus on safety and realism, ProFlight delivers an unparalleled flying experience.
